Name: SokuLauncher
Desc: 測試中的版本，請考慮需要更新。
Notes: - 修正点过 下载 按钮后，再 启用/关闭 任意模组时，保存 按钮始终不可点的错误

Name: Giuroll
Desc:
- added support for a future desync detection mod  
- fixed the "stuck in stage select" bug. It's triggered by either player staying on the after battle screen for too long.  
The frame one freeze mitigation was not the cause and will be included as an option again.

Name: Giuroll-62F
Desc:
### NEW IMPROVED ROLLBACK
**PRE-RELEASE BUILD, VERSION 0.5.3**  
**COMPATIBLE WITH VERSIONS SINCE 0.5.0**  
**0.5.3: FIXED FRAME 1 FREEZE BUG (IF BOTH PLAYERS ARE USING THIS VERSION)**  
**0.5.4: IMPROVED SOUND ROLLBACK**  
**0.5.5: HOTFIX FOR MARISA 2C CAUSING A CRASH**  
This mod fixes any FPS issues related to Windows 10 (most users affected), online mode stuttering, and one-sided rollback.  
  
**It also allows you to rewind replays with the q keys.**  
Installed like any other SWRSToys mod.  
Incompatible with Sokuroll (must be disabled).  
Report any issues to [@Giufin](https://discordapp.com/users/278469240879841280).  
Currently the only known issue is sound being deleted at the end of the round.  
Any other issues, especially freezes and sound related issues, other than the one above should be reported.  
  
**MOST MODS SEEM TO BE COMPATIBLE, EXCEPT DESYNC-PROTECTOR AND HOST-IN-BACKGROUND, BUT IN CASE OF CRASHES OR OTHER ISSUES DISABLE AS MANY MODS AS YOU CAN**  
For more **information**: [https://github.com/Giufinn/giuroll](https://github.com/Giufinn/giuroll)

Name: SokuLobbiesMod
Desc:
Multiplayer online lobby.  
```+ Lobby retry interval and attempts are now in the ini
  + Now remove bugged card stat entries
  + Lowered requirement for 5th character achievement from 1000 games to 500.
  + Changed achievements rewards for play 10, 100 and 500 games.
  + Added emotes without numbers for each characters, unlocked by default (:reimu:, :marisa:, ...).
  + Added more achievements.
  + Added more emotes
  + Now show a message in the chat when using a locked emote.
  + Rewards are shown nicely in the achievement menu.
  + Greatly improved the statstics menu.
  + Greatly improved the achievement menu.
  - All numbered character emotes are now locked behind achievements.
  - Fixed achievements being wrongfully given when playing random
  - Fixed crashes when getting disconnected in some locales.
  - Fixed name being blank on Windows 7.
  - Fixed "SSL connect error" errors on Linux.
  - Fixed crash when using an invalid emote.
  - Fixed a bug causing the stats.dat.backup to not properly be regenerated every time
  - Fixed a bug causing weird characters to appear when a word was too long to fit on a single line```

Name: Autopunch
Desc: This program lets you host & connect to friends to play peer-to-peer games without having to open or redirect any port. This does not add any latency to the connection compared to redirecting ports manually.

Name: SWRSokuRoll
Desc: The Roll Mod used in SokuReplay ranked battles.

Name: InGameHostlist
Desc:
A module that adds hostlist bot integration directly into Hisoutensoku.  
> Added localization support through th123intl.  
> Localization files can be found in ./localization, and should be added to the intl pack to use.  
> Doesn't support non-ascii characters.  
>   
> Thanks to Čchārah for the Livvi Karelian translation.

Name: SokuModLoader
Desc: Necessary tool for injecting mods into games.

Name: InfiniteDecks
Desc:
Removes the 4 decks limit in Touhou 12.3  
> Fixed bug causing specs to send wrong P2 deck

Name: shady-loader
Desc:
A specific fighting game resource manipulation tools  
  
> Changelog:  
>  - Changed mod server to the one owned by Pinky's
>  - Fix path names for some locales

Name: SaveRep
Desc: A mod that saves the replay when the battle is ended by Esc, connection lost, closing window, desync or game crash.

name: IPv6MapSokuMod
Desc:
A mod that makes Soku host and join via IPv4+IPv6 dual stack.

Usage:
- Join other player: copy the address (IPv4 or IPv6) into clipboard, and let Soku read the address from clipboard.
- Host: host as usual, and other players can join you by both IPv4 and IPv6.
